item.title: Maintain Audit PostgreSQL
item.description: This guide shows you the procedure to maintain your Audit Postgres database on your Rhize Kubernetes deployment. Prerequisites Before you start, ensure you have the following: A designated backup location, for example ~/rhize-backups/libre-audit. Access to the Rhize Kubernetes Environment Optional: kubectx utilities kubectx to manage multiple clusters kubens to switch between and configure namespaces easily Optional: the k8 Lens IDE, if you prefer to use Kubernetes graphically Also, before you start, confirm you are in the right context and namespace.
